content: i have removed all of my patterns from ravelry as of march 2021 due to the unresolved accessibility issues my patterns are available at lovecrafts here https //www lovecrafts com/en-gb/l/knitting/knitting-patterns/independent-designers designer_name=29305 this is a warm fingerless mitt that uses a simple houndstooth pattern on the main section it s a good introduction to stranded colourwork and should knit up quickly with dk yarn for a really professional finish you can use the tubular cast-on/off techniques excellent tutorials can be found here 1 and here 2 respectively more details about the pattern can be found at a pile of sheep 3 1 http //techknitting blogspot com/2008/01/provisional-tail-method-of-1-x-1 html 2 http //techknitting blogspot com/2008/01/tubular-cast-off-its-pretty html 3 http //apileofsheep wordpress com/2012/01/03/free-pattern-houndstooth-handwarmers/
